title: PEDROLUNET.DEV
description:
An exploration of digital brutalism and Swiss design principles. Built using my favourite web framework, Svelte, and experimenting with motion using GSAP. This site prioritizes raw information density, strict grid adherence, and typographic hierarchy over decorative elements. A performant canvas for my projects and thoughts.

I started this project because my previous portfolio didn't feel authentic to my identity and failed to showcase my work the way I envisioned. I wanted to create a space that felt more personal and reflected my design sensibilities, while pushing Svelte 5 to its limits in terms of performance and interactivity.

title: Morphology
description: A study in algorithmic growth patterns. Using reaction-diffusion equations to generate infinite variations of organic textures.

title: Urban Decay
description: Documenting the quiet collapse of modern structures. Shot on Ilford HP5+ and developed by hand.

title: System 01
description: A comprehensive UI kit for academic dashboards. Focused on high-contrast accessibility and density.

title: Playground
description: Code sketches and 3D explorations. A collection of half-baked ideas and visual experiments.
